Florian Kohlscheen Projekt

at the moment the only band i perform in is the Florian Kohlscheen Projekt.

however i used to perform and create music in the following bands:

Taste Of Desolation: facebook.com/tasteofdesolation

  • Forsake EP '11: available as a stream, in the webstore and in most mp3-stores like iTunes

  • The Fallen EP
  • Taste Of Desolation Single

Running Death: facebook.com/runningdeath

  • Raging Nightmare (free download)

  • further, without recordings: Born Backwards, ForeBear
